summary: This is an email chain from October 2021 between an Assistant United States Attorney and an FBI Special Agent discussing documents and witness testimony related to the Epstein investigation. The emails reference a 2006 FBI interview (302) and request notes and documents from a witness who worked at Epstein's residence.

events.title: FBI Interview of Witness
events.description: An FBI interview (302) was conducted with a witness. The witness provided a copy of hours worked at Epstein's residence and notes made during employment.

events.title: Interview of Another Individual
events.description: An interview was conducted with another individual, as referenced by the request for notes from that 8/15/06 interview.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is a 2021 email chain discussing evidence from the 2006 Epstein investigation.
It references a witness who worked at Epstein's residence and provided documentation of hours worked and notes.
The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney and an FBI Special Agent coordinating to obtain interview notes and documents.
A specific meeting is noted between the witness and 'GM' to discuss house repairs, for which the witness was paid $1,000.
